content.p: Our webpages contain detailed information about all processes in your student journey. Check them out alongside our student enquiry centre to find the information you need. You can head to our contact page to find details of how to get in touch either at a student service centre, or online. A to Z of services View our FAQs, submit your enquiries and extenuating circumstances claims Information about how you can take care of your mental health and information about specialist services Quick links to the forms that you might need to support your studies Our webpage contains all of the information you need about your assessments and exams Access timetables, book a room or submit an enquiry Learn about modules, complete enrolment and get help if you need it While you are studying with us at Nottingham we want you to feel supported and connected to our specialist services to enable you to have the best possible university experience whatever stage of your academic journey youâ€™re at. Discover the services available, including: admissions, accommodation, disability support, careers, sport and fitness, libraries, visa and immigration advice and more. Access our cost of living, funding and financial support and student fees and payments webpages Access the extenuating circumstances procedure and related frequently asked questions Explore our webpages to help you through your postgraduate research journey
